<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SecurityAudit</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script include contain the script to audit the instance for security configurations. It is meant to be client-callable since it is called from a UI page. It performs the following actions:

- Deletes all previous records from the Security Best Practices Audit Results table.
- Runs the Security Best Practices Audit and collects the results.
- Inserts the new results within the Security Best Practices Audit Results table.
- Send the copy of results to the client script that requested it from a UI page. </description><name>SecurityAudit</name><script><![CDATA[var SecurityAudit = Class.create();
SecurityAudit.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	run: function(){
		var result = '';
		var output = '';

		//find version assigned
		var current_version = gs.getProperty('glide.war.assigned');
		if (current_version == null) {
			var build = new GlideRecord('sys_upgrade_history');
			build.addEncodedQuery('from_version!=n/a^ORfrom_versionISEMPTY');
			build.orderByDesc('upgrade_finished');
			build.setLimit('1');
			build.query();
			if (build.next()){ current_version = build.to_version; }
		} else {
			current_version = current_version;
		}
		var version = this.newItem("version");
		version.setAttribute("instance_build", " " + JSON.stringify(current_version));


		this._doit("u_security_best_practices_audit"); // deleting old records in the table

		//5.1 Check for Default Credentials

		var a = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		a.addQuery('user_name', 'admin');
		a.addQuery('user_password', '0DPiKuNIrrVmD8IUCuw1hQxNqZc=');
		a.addQuery('active', 'true');
		a.query();
		var b = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		b.addQuery('user_name', 'itil');
		b.addQuery('user_password', 'q3zDxMCcVS+IN10lIqXqFbR7W7Q=');
		b.addQuery('active', 'true');
		b.query();
		var c = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		c.addQuery('user_name', 'employee');
		c.addQuery('user_password', 'yvMi8Lvtch6sSja/ev8RAwefryU=');
		c.addQuery('active', 'true');
		c.query();
		if(!a.hasNext() && !b.hasNext() && !c.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			this._logResults(result, '5.1', 'Change Default Credentials', 'System Definition > Tables > sys_user', 'No Default Credentials Found', 'No Default Credentials Found', 'Authentication');
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			this._logResults(result, '5.1', 'Change Default Credentials', 'System Definition > Tables > sys_user', 'Found', 'No Default Credentials Found', 'Authentication');
		}

		//5.2 Remove default credentials from the Welcome page
		a = new GlideRecord('sys_home');
		a.addQuery('short_description', 'How To Login');
		a.addQuery('active', '1');
		a.addQuery('text', 'CONTAINS', 'The System Administrator');
		a.addQuery('text', 'CONTAINS', 'Password:');
		a.query();
		if(!a.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			this._logResults(result, '5.2', 'Remove Credentials From Welcome Page', 'System UI > Welcome Page', 'Not Found', 'No Default Credentials Found', 'Authentication');
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			this._logResults(result, '5.2', 'Remove Credentials From Welcome Page', 'System UI > Welcome Page', 'Found', 'No Default Credentials Found', 'Authentication');
		}

		// 8.2 Remove Demo Data - Can be manually checked if required..
		// 8.4 Individual login IDs - Can be manually checked if required..

		//3.1 Contextual Security
		this._checkPlugin('Contextual Security', 'com.glide.role_management', 'active', '3.1', 'Access Control');

		//3.13 Explicit Role Plugin
		this._checkPlugin('Explicit Role Plugin', 'com.glide.explicit_roles', 'active', '3.13', 'Access Control');

		// 9.1 Certificate Trust
		if(gs.getProperty('com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all')=="false") {
			result = 'Pass';
			this._logResults(result, '9.1', 'Certificate Trust', 'System Properties > com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all ', 'false', 'false', 'Secure Communication');
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			this._logResults(result, '9.1', 'Certificate Trust', 'System Properties > com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all', 'true', 'false', 'Secure Communication');
		}

		// 12.3 Logging and Auditing
		a = new GlideRecord('sysevent');
		a.addQuery('name', 'login');
		a.query();
		if(a.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			this._logResults(result, '12.3', 'Logging and Auditing', 'System Logs > Events', 'Enabled', 'Enabled', 'Logging/Errors');
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			this._logResults(result, '12.3', 'Logging and Auditing', 'System Logs > Events', 'Not Enabled', 'Enabled', 'Logging/Errors');
		}

		// 8.3 Patches and Updates - Should be checked before hardening is engaged.

		// 3.2 Default Deny property
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.sm.default_mode', 'Default Deny', 'deny', '3.2', 'Access Control');

		//3.3 Restrict Access to Specific IP Ranges
		var ipRangeCheck = this._checkPluginDep('IP Range Based Authentication', 'active', 'N/A');
		if (ipRangeCheck == 'Pass'){
			var ratsipr = new GlideRecord('ip_access');
			ratsipr.addEncodedQuery('type=allow^range_startISEMPTY^ORrange_startSTARTSWITH0.0.^ORrange_endISEMPTY^ORrange_endSTARTSWITH0.0.^ORrange_end=255.255.255.255');
			if (ratsipr.next()) {
				result = 'Fail';
				output = 'Not active';
			} else {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
			}
			this._logResults(result, '3.3', 'Restrict Access to Specific IP Ranges', 'System Security > IP Address Access Control', output, 'active', 'Access Control');
		}
	   else {
		   result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Dependent plugin is not active';
			this._logResults(result, '3.3', 'Restrict Access to Specific IP Ranges', 'System Security > IP Address Access Control', output, 'active', 'Access Control');
			}


		// 3.11 SNC Access Control Plugin - Optional.
		this._checkPlugin('SNC Access Control Plugin', 'com.snc.snc_access_control', 'active', '3.11', 'Access Control');

		// 3.4 Security Jump Start - ACL Rules
		this._checkPlugin('Security Jump Start (ACL Rules)', 'com.snc.system_security', 'active', '3.4', 'Access Control');

		// 8.1 High Security Plugin
		this._checkPlugin('High Security Plugin', 'com.glide.high_security', 'active', '8.1', 'Security Best Practices');

		//2.1
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_text', 'Escape XML', 'true', '2.1', 'Input Validation');
		//2.2
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_all_script', 'Escape Jelly', 'true', '2.2', 'Input Validation');
		//7.1
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.rotate_sessions', 'Rotate HTTP Session Identifiers', 'true', '7.1', 'Session Management');
		//7.2
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.secure_cookies', 'Secure Session Cookies', 'true', '7.2', 'Session Management');
		//3.5
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.strict.updates', 'Double Check Inbound Transactions', 'true', '3.5', 'Access Control');
		//3.6
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.strict.actions', 'Check UI Action Conditions Before Execution', 'true', '3.6', 'Access Control');
		//7.5
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.use_csrf_token', 'Anti-CSRF Token', 'true', '7.5', 'Session Management');
		//7.6
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.csrf.strict.validation.mode', 'CSRF Strict Validation', 'true', '7.6', 'Session Management');
		//2.3
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_html_list_field', 'Escape HTML', 'true', '2.3', 'Input Validation');
		//2.4
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.html.escape_script', 'Escape JavaScript', 'true', '2.4', 'Input Validation');
		// 5.3
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.forgetme', 'Remove Remember Me', 'true', '5.3','Authentication');
		// 4.1
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.smtp.auth', 'SMTP Authentication', 'true', '4.1', 'Authentication');
		//2.5
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.use.sandbox', 'Client Generated Scripts Sandbox', 'true', '2.5', 'Input Validation');
		//2.10
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.soap.strict_security', 'SOAP Request Strict Security', 'true', '2.10', 'Input Validation');
		//2.11 Jelly/JS Interpolation
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.jelly.js_interpolation.protect', 'Jelly/JS Interpolation', 'true', '2.11', 'Input Validation');
		// 4.2
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.wsdl', 'WSDL Request Authorization', 'true', '4.2', 'Authorization');
		// 4.3
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.csv', 'CSV Request Authorization', 'true', '4.3', 'Authorization');
		// 4.4
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.excel', 'Excel Request Authorization', 'true', '4.4', 'Authorization');
		// 4.5
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.importprocessor', 'Import Request Authorization', 'true', '4.5', 'Authorization');
		//4.6
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.pdf', 'PDF Request Authorization', 'true', '4.6', 'Authorization');
		//4.7
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.rss', 'RSS Request Authorization', 'true', '4.7', 'Authorization');
		//4.8
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.scriptedprocessor', 'Script Request Authorization', 'true', '4.8', 'Authorization');
		//4.9
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.soap', 'Basic Auth : SOAP Requests', 'true', '4.9', 'Authorization');
		//4.10
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.jsonv2', 'Basic Auth : JSONv2 Requests', 'true', '4.10', 'Authorization');
		//4.11
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.unl', 'Unload Request Authorization', 'true', '4.11', 'Authorization');
		//4.12
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.xml', 'XML Request Authorization', 'true', '4.12', 'Authorization');
		//4.13
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.xsd', 'XSD Request Authorization', 'true', '4.13', 'Authorization');
		//10.1
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.cms.catalog_uri_relative', 'Enforce Relative Links', 'true', '10.1' , 'Security Whitelisting');
		//10.2
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.set_x_frame_options', 'X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN', 'true', '10.2', 'Security Whitelisting');
		//2.6
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.security.allow_codetag', 'Allow Embedded HTML Code', 'false', '2.6', 'Input Validation');
		//2.7
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.security.codetag.allow_script', 'Allow Javascript tags in Embedded HTML', 'false', '2.7', 'Input Validation');
		//2.8
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.allow.ajaxevaluate', 'Enable AJAXEvaluate', 'false', '2.8', 'Input Validation');
		//5.4
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.login.autocomplete', 'Password Field Autocomplete', 'false', '5.4', 'Authentication');

		// 10.6 packages call removal tool
		var status = '';
		var pcrt0 = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_package');
		pcrt0.query();
		if(!pcrt0.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'Pre-conditions not met : Skipped Check';
			status = 'Not Required';

		} else {
			var pcrt1 = new GlideRecord('v_plugin');
				pcrt1.addQuery('name', 'Packages Call Removal Tool');
				pcrt1.addQuery('active', 'active');
				pcrt1.query();
			if (!pcrt1.hasNext()) {
						result = 'Fail';
						output = 'Plugin not active';
				status = 'Plugin must be active';
			} else {
				result = 'Pass';
				output = 'Plugin is active';
				status = 'Plugin must be active';
			}
		}
			this._logResults(result, '10.6', 'Packages Call Removal Tool', 'System Definition > Plugins > com.glide.script.packages_call_removal', output, status, 'Security Whitelisting');


		// 10.7 system whitelist packages
		var d = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_package');
		d.query();
		if(!d.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'No Java Package Calls';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Existing Java Package Calls';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '10.7', 'Check Whitelist Package Calls', 'System Definition > Tables > sys_whitelist_package', output, 'No Java Package Calls', 'Security Whitelisting');

		// 10.8 system whitelist member
		var cwmc1 = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_member');
		cwmc1.query();
		if(!cwmc1.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'No Java Member Calls';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Existing Java Member Calls';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '10.8', 'Check Whitelist Member Calls', 'System Definition > Tables > sys_whitelist_member', output, 'No Java Member Calls', 'Security Whitelisting');

		// 4.14 SAML2.0
		b = new GlideRecord('v_plugin');
		b.addQuery('id', 'com.snc.integration.sso.saml20.update1');
		b.addQuery('active', 'active');
		b.query();
		if (b.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '4.14', 'SAML 2.0 Web Browser SSO Profile', 'System Definition > Plugins > com.snc.integration.sso.saml20.update1', output, 'active', 'Authorization');

		// 3.7 Performance Monitoring ACL
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.diag_txns_acl','Performance Monitoring ACL', 'true', '3.7', 'Access Control');

		//3.8 Performance Monitoring IP Restriction
		var pmipr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		pmipr.addEncodedQuery('name=glide.custom.ip.authenticate.allow^valueISNOTEMPTY^valueNOT LIKE0.0.0.0');
		pmipr.query();
		if (pmipr.next()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '3.8', 'Performance Monitoring IP Restriction', 'System Properties > glide.custom.ip.authenticate.allow', output, 'IP Addresses (0.0.0.0 is not allowed)', 'Access Control');


		//3.12 Secure IP restriction
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ip.authenticate.strict','Secure IP restriction', 'true', '3.12', 'Access Control');

		//7.3 Session Timeout
		var session_timeout = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.session_timeout');
		if(session_timeout > 0 ) {
			result = 'Pass';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '7.3', 'Session Activity Timeout', 'System Properties > glide.ui.session_timeout', session_timeout, 'Timeout value in integer(Example: 60) ', 'Session Management');

		//7.4 Cookies HTTP Only
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.cookies.http_only','Cookies HTTP Only', 'true', '7.4', 'Session Management');


		//12.1 Managin Failed login Attempts
		var e = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		e.addQuery('sys_id', '5e5183350a0a0a0a00093b591ece409f');
		e.addQuery('active', '1');
		e.query();
		var f = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		f.addQuery('sys_id', '5e44f9bf0a0a0a0a019a6440b2137767');
		f.addQuery('active', '1');
		f.query();
		var g = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		g.addQuery('sys_id', 'd92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567');
		g.addQuery('active', '1');
		g.query();
		if ((e.hasNext() && f.hasNext()) || g.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '12.1', 'Managing Failed Login Attempts', 'System Policy > Script Actions', output, 'active', 'Logging/Errors');

		// 2.9 HTML Sanitizer
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.html.sanitize_all_fields', 'HTML Sanitizer', 'true', '2.9', 'Input Validation');

		// 6.1 Downloadable MIME Types

		var fdmt = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.attachment.force_download_all_mime_types'); //previously 6.4
		if (fdmt == 'true'){
			result = 'Pass';
			output = fdmt;
			this._logResults(result, '6.1', 'Downloadable Mime Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.attachment.force_download_all_mime_types', output, 'true', 'Attachments');
		} else {
			var mime_types = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.attachment.download_mime_types');
			if(!gs.nil(mime_types)){
				result = 'Pass';
				output = mime_types;
				this._logResults(result, '6.1', 'Downloadable Mime Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.attachment.download_mime_types', output, 'Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				output = 'Not defined';
				this._logResults(result, '6.1', 'Downloadable Mime Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.attachment.force_download_all_mime_types OR glide.ui.attachment.download_mime_types', output, 'true OR Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
			}
		}

		// 6.2 Enable File Download Restrictions
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_static_content', 'Enable File Download Restrictions', 'true', '6.2', 'Attachments');

		// 6.3 Specify Downloadable File Types
		var downloadable_types = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_content_types');
			if(!gs.nil(downloadable_types)){
				result = 'Pass';
				output = downloadable_types;
				this._logResults(result, '6.3', 'Downloadable File Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_content_types', output, 'Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
			} else if(gs.nil(downloadable_types)) {
				result = 'Pass';
				output = "Default: ico,gif,png,jpg,jpeg,bmp,ogg,mp3";
				this._logResults(result, '6.3', 'Downloadable File Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_content_types', output, 'Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				output = 'Not defined';
				this._logResults(result, '6.3', 'Downloadable File Types', 'System Properties > glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_content_types', output, 'Some Defined File Types respectively', 'Attachments');
			}

		//6.4 Restrict File extensions for Attachment
		if(!gs.nil(gs.getProperty('glide.attachment.extensions'))) {
			output = gs.getProperty('glide.attachment.extensions');
			result = 'Pass';
			this._logResults(result, '6.4', 'Restrict File Extensions', 'System Properties > glide.attachment.extensions', output, 'Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			this._logResults(result, '6.4', 'Restrict File Extensions', 'System Properties > glide.attachment.extensions', 'Not Defined', 'Some Defined File Types', 'Attachments');
		}

		//6.5 Upload MIME Type Restriction
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.file.mime_type.validation', 'Upload MIME Type Restriction', 'true', '6.5', 'Attachments');

		//6.6 Restrict Unauthenticated Access to Attachments
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.image_provider.security_enabled', 'Restrict Unauthenticated Access to Attachments', 'true', '6.6', 'Attachments');

		//3.10 SOAP Content Type Checking
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.soap.require_content_type_xml', 'SOAP Content Type Checking', 'true', '3.10', 'Access Control');

		//9.2 Disabling SSLv2/SSLv3
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.outbound.sslv3.disabled', 'Disabling SSLv2/SSLv3', 'true', '9.2', 'Secure Communication');

		//3.9 Enabling AJAXGlideRecord ACL Checking
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.secure.ajaxgliderecord', 'Enabling AJAXGlideRecord ACL Checking', 'true', '3.9', 'Access Control');

		//10.3 URL white list
		var h = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		h.addEncodedQuery('name=glide.security.url.whitelist^valueISNOTEMPTY');
		h.query();
		if (h.next()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '10.3', 'URL Whitelist For Logout Redirects', 'System Properties > glide.security.url.whitelist', output, 'active', 'Security Whitelisting');


		//10.9 collection mode override
		var gr2 = gs.getProperty('glide.whitelist.manager.collection_mode.override');
		if((gr2 == "false") || (gr2 == null) || (gr2 == "undefined")){
			this._logResults('Pass', '10.9', 'Collection Mode', 'System Properties > glide.whitelist.manager.collection_mode.override', 'false', 'false', 'Security Whitelisting');
		} else {
			this._logResults('Fail', '10.9', 'Collection Mode', 'System Properties > glide.whitelist.manager.collection_mode.override', 'true', 'false', 'Security Whitelisting');
		}

		//12.2 Disabling SQL error messages
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.db.loguser', 'Disabling SQL error messages', 'false', '12.2', 'Logging/Errors');

		//10.4 XML External Entity Processing - Validation
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.xml.entity.whitelist.enabled', 'XML External Entity Processing - Validation', 'true', '10.4', 'Security Whitelisting');

		//10.5 XML External Entity Processing - Whitelist
		h = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		h.addEncodedQuery('name=glide.xml.entity.whitelist^valueISNOTEMPTY');
		h.query();
		if (h.next()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '10.5', 'XML External Entity Processing - Whitelist', 'System Properties > glide.xml.entity.whitelist', output, 'active', 'Security Whitelisting');

		//5.5 strong passwords
		var esp = new GlideRecord('sys_installation_exit');
		esp.addQuery('override', 'PasswordStronger');
		esp.addQuery('active', '1');
		esp.query();
		new_sys_id = esp.sys_id;
		if (esp.hasNext()) {
			result = 'Pass';
			output = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			output = 'Not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, '5.5', 'Enforce Strong Passwords', 'System Definition > Installation Exits', output, 'active', 'Authentication');

		// 5.6 Disable Password-Less Authentication
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.login.no_blank_password', 'Disable Password-Less Authentication', 'true', '5.6', 'Authentication');

		//11 Inbound Email Configuration

		//11.1 Restrict By Domain
		var current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			current = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3readerjob.create_caller'); //creating user from email must be active
			if (current == 'true'){
				output = gs.getProperty('glide.user.trusted_domain'); // if above conditions are met, then check for trusted domain
				if(!gs.nil(output)) {
					if(output == '*'){
						result ='Fail';
					} else {
						result = 'Pass';
					}
					this._logResults(result, '11.1', 'Restrict Emails by Domain', 'System Properties > glide.user.trusted_domain', output, 'Specific Domain/s defined', 'Email Security');
				} else {
					result = 'Fail'; // if no values specified
					this._logResults(result, '11.1', 'Restrict Emails by Domain', 'System Properties > glide.user.trusted_domain', output, 'Specific Domain/s defined', 'Email Security');
				}
			} else {
				this._logResults('Pass', '11.1', 'Restrict Emails by Domain', 'System Properties > glide.user.trusted_domain', 'Pre-conditions not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
			}
		} else {
			this._logResults('Pass', '11.1', 'Restrict Emails by Domain', 'System Properties > glide.user.trusted_domain', 'Pre-conditions not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
		}

		//11.2 Set Complex 'Default' Password
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			current = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3readerjob.create_caller'); //creating user from email must be active
			if (current == 'true'){
				output = gs.getProperty('glide.user.default_password'); //get the value of the property
				if(!gs.nil(output)) {
					if (output == 'Password' || 'password'){ // if value is password , result is fail
						result = 'Fail';
					} else {
						result = 'Pass';
					}
					this._logResults(result, '11.2', 'Set Complex "Default" Password', 'System Properties > glide.user.default_password', output, 'Strong Password', 'Email Security');
				} else {
					result = 'Fail';
					this._logResults(result, '11.2', 'Set Complex "Default" Password', 'System Properties > glide.user.default_password', output, 'Strong Password', 'Email Security');
				}
			} else {
				this._logResults('Pass', '11.2', 'Set Complex "Default" Password', 'System Properties > glide.user.default_password', 'Pre-conditions not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
			}
		} else {
			this._logResults('Pass', '11.2', 'Set Complex "Default" Password', 'System Properties > glide.user.default_password', 'Pre-conditons not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
		}

		//11.3 Convert Inbound Email HTML
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			this._checkGlideProperty('glide.email.inbound.convert_html_inline_attachment_references', 'Convert Inbound Email HTML', 'false', '11.3', 'Email Security');
		} else {
			this._logResults('Pass', '11.3', 'Convert Inbound Email HTML', 'System Properties > convert_html_inline_attachment_references', 'Pre-conditons not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
		}

		//11.4 Email Spam Scoring and Filtering
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			output = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3.ignore_headers'); //get the value of the prerequisite property
			if(!gs.nil(output)) { // if vaule is defined
				this._checkPlugin('Email Filter', 'com.glide.email_filter', 'active', '11.4', 'Email Security');
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				this._logResults(result, '11.4', 'Email Filter', 'com.glide.email_filter', 'Prerequisite Property Not Defined', 'active', 'Email Security');
			}
		} else {
			this._logResults('Pass', '11.4', 'Email Filter', 'com.glide.email_filter', 'Pre-conditons not met : Skipped check', 'Not Required', 'Email Security');
		}

		//19.1 Mobile UI Obfuscation
		this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.m.blur_ui_when_backgrounded', 'Mobile UI Obfuscation', 'true', '19.1', 'Mobile Security');

},
// End of run function

// Start defining functions:

_doit: function(table) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	gr.query();
	gr.deleteMultiple();
},

_checkGlideProperty: function(property, name, check, ref, category){
	var result = '';
	var output = '';
	var config = 'System Properties > '+property+'';
	var current = gs.getProperty(property);
	if (current == check) {
		result = 'Pass';
		this._logResults(result, ref, name, config, current, check, category);
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
	this._logResults(result, ref, name, config, current, check, category);
	}

},

_checkPlugin: function(plugin, sys_prop, check, ref, category) {
	var result = '';
	var latest = '';
	var pconfig = 'System Definition > Plugins > '+sys_prop+'';
	if (check == 'active'){
		if (GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
			result = 'Pass';
			latest = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			latest = 'not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, ref, plugin, pconfig, latest, check, category);
	} else {
		if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
			result = 'Pass';
			latest = 'active';
		} else {
			result = 'Fail';
			latest = 'not active';
		}
		this._logResults(result, ref, plugin, pconfig, latest, check, category);
	}
},

_checkPluginDep: function(plugin, check, ref){
	var pluginGr = new GlideRecord('v_plugin');
	pluginGr.addQuery('name', plugin);
	pluginGr.addQuery('active', check);
	pluginGr.query();
	if(pluginGr.hasNext()) {
		result = 'Pass';
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
	}
	return result;
},

_logResults : function(value, refer, name, sys_prop, latest, check, category) {
	var config = '';
	var favs = this.newItem("favorite");
	favs.setAttribute("value", value);

	if (refer == '9.1' || refer == '12.3' || refer == '3.3'|| refer == '3.11' || refer == '3.13' || refer == '4.1' || refer == '6.3' || refer == '7.6'|| refer == '4.14' || refer == '3.8' || refer == '3.12' || refer == '9.2' || refer == '10.5' ){
		config = 'Optional';
	} else if (refer == '5.3'||refer == '4.2'||refer == '4.3'|| refer == '4.4'|| refer == '4.5'|| refer == '4.6'|| refer == '4.7'|| refer == '4.9'||refer == '4.10'||refer == '4.12'||refer == '4.13'||refer == '5.4'|| refer == '3.7' || refer == '11.3'|| refer == '12.1'|| refer == '3.3.2'|| refer == '3.3.4'|| refer == '6.4'|| refer == '6.5'|| refer == '3.10' || refer == '12.2' || refer == '10.4' || refer == '5.5' || refer == '11.1' || refer == '11.2' || refer == '7.3' || refer =='11.4' || refer =='19.1'){
		config = 'Recommended';
	} else {
		config = 'Mandatory';
	}

	favs.setAttribute("config", config);

	var ref_link = 'https://hi.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0550654#' + refer + '';
	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_security_best_practices_audit');
	gr.initialize();
	gr.u_result = value;
	gr.u_reference = refer;
	gr.u_property_name = name;
	gr.u_current_value = latest;
	gr.u_reference_url = ref_link;
	gr.u_recommended_value = check;
	gr.u_configuration = config;
	gr.u_system_property = sys_prop;
	gr.u_category = category;
	gr.insert();
},
//End defining function

  type: 'SecurityAudit'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>romil.sheth@snc_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-30 01:43:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a5667d7db3a1600305259e49f96193d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SecurityAudit</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Best Practices" source="5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Best Practices">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7a5667d7db3a1600305259e49f96193d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>romil.sheth</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-30 21:35:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_08fc1760db267200305279e49f96193a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EnableRecommended</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script include contain the script to enable all the recommended settings for security configurations. It is meant to be client-callable since it is called from a UI page. It performs the following actions:

- Check each recommended config to verify if it is enabled or not.
- If it is not enabled, the script will enable it with the recommended value mentioned in the Hardening Guide.
- If the property/plugin does not exist, it will create a new one and assign the recommended value.
- Send the copy of results to the client script that requested it from a UI page. </description><name>EnableRecommended</name><script><![CDATA[var EnableRecommended = Class.create();
EnableRecommended.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

run: function(){
	var output = "", result = "", message ="", property = "";

	//8.3 Patches and Updates : Should be handelled manually

	//5.3 Remove Remember Me
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.forgetme', 'true');

	//4.2 WSDL Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.wsdl', 'true');

	//4.3 CSV Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.csv', 'true');

	//4.4 Excel Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.excel', 'true');

	//4.5 Import Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.importprocessor', 'true');

	//4.6 PDF Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.pdf', 'true');

	//4.7 RSS Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.rss', 'true');

	//4.9 SOAP Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.soap', 'true');

	//4.10 JSONv2 Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.jsonv2', 'true');

	//4.12 XML Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.xml', 'true');

	//4.13 XSD Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.xsd', 'true');

	//5.4 Password Field Autocomplete
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.login.autocomplete', 'false');

	//3.7 Performance Monitoring ACL
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.diag_txns_acl', 'true');

	//7.3 Session Activity Timeout
	var r_property = 'glide.ui.session_timeout';
	var session_timeout = gs.getProperty(r_property);
		if(session_timeout > 0 ) {
			message = "Pre-Enabled";
		} else {
			gs.setProperty(r_property, '60'); // confirm if it is enabled
			if(gs.getProperty(r_property) == '60'){
				message = "Changed to recommended value : 60";
			} else {
				message = "Fail to enable the property";
			}
		}
		this._logResults('Session Activity Timeout', message);

	// 12.1 Managing Failed Login Attempts
	var e = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
	e.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=5e5183350a0a0a0a00093b591ece409f^active=true');
	e.query();
	var f = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
	f.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=5e44f9bf0a0a0a0a019a6440b2137767^active=true');
	f.query();
	var g = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
	g.addQuery('sys_id=d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567^active=true');
	g.query();
	if (e.hasNext() && f.hasNext() && g.hasNext()) {
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		var e1 = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		e1.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=5e5183350a0a0a0a00093b591ece409f');
		e1.query();
		while (e1.next()) {
			e1.setValue('active', 'true');
			e1.update();}
		var f1 = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		f1.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=5e44f9bf0a0a0a0a019a6440b2137767');
		f1.query();
		while (f1.next()) {
			f1.setValue('active', 'true');
			f1.update();}
		var g1 = new GlideRecord('sysevent_script_action');
		g1.addQuery('sys_id=d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567');
		g1.query();
		while (g1.next()) {
			g1.setValue('active', 'true');
			g1.update();}
			message = 'Enabled';
					}
		this._logResults('Managing Failed Login Attempts', message);

	//6.2 Enable File Download Restrictions*
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_static_content', 'true');

	//6.5 Restrict File Extensions
	r_property = 'glide.attachment.extensions';
	if(!gs.nil(gs.getProperty(r_property))) {
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		gs.setProperty(r_property, 'xls,xlsx,doc,docx,pdf'); // confirm if it is enabled
		if(!gs.nil(gs.getProperty(r_property))){
			message = "Changed to recommended value : xls,xlsx,doc,docx,pdf";
		} else {
			message = "Fail to enable the property";
		}
	}
	this._logResults('Restrict File Extensions', message);

	//6.6 Upload MIME Type Restriction
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.file.mime_type.validation', 'true');

	//3.10 SOAP Content Type Checking
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.soap.require_content_type_xml', 'true');

	//12.2 Disabling SQL error messages
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.db.loguser', 'false');

	//10.4 XML External Entity Processing - Validation
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.xml.entity.whitelist.enabled', 'true');

	//5.5 Enforce Strong Password
	var vps = new GlideRecord('sys_installation_exit');
	vps.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=45c28b420a0a0b840009e5cf4a185462^active=true');
	vps.query();
	if(vps.hasNext()){
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		var vps1 = new GlideRecord('sys_installation_exit');
			vps1.addEncodedQuery('sys_id=45c28b420a0a0b840009e5cf4a185462');
			vps1.query();
			while (vps1.next()) {
			vps1.setValue('active', 'true');
			vps1.update();}
			message = 'Enabled';
	}
	this._logResults('Enforce Strong Password', message);


		//11.1 Restrict By Domain
		var current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			current = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3readerjob.create_caller'); //creating user from email must be active
			if (current == 'true'){
				output = gs.getProperty('glide.user.trusted_domain'); // if above conditions are met, then check for trusted domain
				if(!gs.nil(output)) {
					if(output == '*'){
						message = 'Manual Intervention Needed';
					} else {
						message = "Pre-Enabled";
					}
					this._logResults('Restrict By Domain', message);
				} else {
					message = 'Manual Intervention Needed'; // if no values specified
					this._logResults('Restrict By Domain', message);
				}
			} else {
				message = "Not Required";
				this._logResults('Restrict By Domain', message);
			}
		} else {
			message = "Not Required";
			this._logResults('Restrict By Domain', message);
		}

		//11.2 Set Complex 'Default' Password
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			current = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3readerjob.create_caller'); //creating user from email must be active
			if (current == 'true'){
				output = gs.getProperty('glide.user.default_password'); //get the value of the property
				if(!gs.nil(output)) {
					if (output == 'Password' || 'password'){ // if value is password , result is fail
						message = 'Manual Intervention Needed';
					} else {
						message = "Pre-Enabled";

					}
					this._logResults('Set Complex "Default" Password', message);
				} else {
					message = 'Manual Intervention Needed';
					this._logResults('Set Complex "Default" Password', message);
				}
			} else {
				message = "Not Required";
				this._logResults('Set Complex "Default" Password', message);
			}
		} else {
			message = "Not Required";
				this._logResults('Set Complex "Default" Password', message);
		}

		//11.3 Convert Inbound Email HTML
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			this._checkGlideProperty('glide.email.inbound.convert_html_inline_attachment_references', 'false');
		} else {
			message = "Not Required";
			this._logResults('Convert Inbound Email HTML', message);
		}

		//11.4 Email Spam Scoring and Filtering
		current = gs.getProperty('glide.email.read.active'); //incoming email must be active
		if (current == 'true') {
			output = gs.getProperty('glide.pop3.ignore_headers'); //get the value of the prerequisite property
			if(!gs.nil(output)) { // if value is defined
				this._checkPlugin('com.glide.email_filter', 'active');
			} else {
			message = "Not Required";
			this._logResults('Email Spam Scoring and Filtering', message);
			}
		} else {
			message = "Not Required";
			this._logResults('Email Spam Scoring and Filtering', message);
		}

	//19.1 Mobile UI Obfuscation
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.m.blur_ui_when_backgrounded', 'true');

},

	//Output function

	_logResults : function(property, message) {
		var prop_msg = this.newItem("prop_msg");
		prop_msg.setAttribute("message", message);
		prop_msg.setAttribute("property", property);

	},

	// Generic function to execute property changes
	_checkGlideProperty: function(property, desired_value) {
		var message = "";
		if(gs.getProperty(property) == desired_value) {
			message = "Pre-Enabled";
		} else {
			gs.setProperty(property, desired_value); // confirm if it is enabled
			if(gs.getProperty(property) == desired_value){
				message = "Enabled";
			} else {
				message = "Fail to enable the property";
			}
		}
		this._logResults(property, message);
	},

	_checkPlugin: function(sys_prop, check) {
		var result = '';
		var latest = '';
		var message = '';
		var gpm;
		if (check == 'active'){
			if (GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
				result = 'Pass';
				message = 'Pre-Enabled';
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				gpm = new GlidePluginManager();
				gpm.registerPlugin(sys_prop);
				message = 'Enabled';

			}
			this._logResults(sys_prop, message);
		} else {
			if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
				result = 'Pass';
				message = 'Pre-Enabled';
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				gpm = new GlidePluginManager();
				gpm.registerPlugin(sys_prop);
				message = 'Enabled';
			}
			this._logResults(sys_prop, message);
		}
	},

  type: 'EnableRecommended'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>romil.sheth_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-30 18:02:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>08fc1760db267200305279e49f96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EnableRecommended</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Best Practices" source="5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Best Practices">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08fc1760db267200305279e49f96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>romil.sheth</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-30 21:42:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EnableMandatory</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script include contain the script to enable all the mandatory settings for security configurations. It is meant to be client-callable since it is called from a UI page. It performs the following actions:

- Check each mandatory config to verify if it is enabled or not.
- If it is not enabled, the script will enable it with the recommended value mentioned in the Hardening Guide.
- If the property/plugin does not exist, it will create a new one and assign the recommended value.
- Send the copy of results to the client script that requested it from a UI page. </description><name>EnableMandatory</name><script><![CDATA[var EnableMandatory = Class.create();
EnableMandatory.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

run: function(){
	var output = "", result = "", message ="", property = "";

	//5.1 Check for Default Credentials
	var a = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	a.addQuery('user_name', 'admin');
	a.addQuery('user_password', '0DPiKuNIrrVmD8IUCuw1hQxNqZc=');
	a.addQuery('active', 'true');
	a.query();
	var b = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	b.addQuery('user_name', 'itil');
	b.addQuery('user_password', 'q3zDxMCcVS+IN10lIqXqFbR7W7Q=');
	b.addQuery('active', 'true');
	b.query();
	var c = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	c.addQuery('user_name', 'employee');
	c.addQuery('user_password', 'yvMi8Lvtch6sSja/ev8RAwefryU=');
	c.addQuery('active', 'true');
	c.query();
	if(!a.hasNext() && !b.hasNext() && !c.hasNext()) {
		result = 'Pass';
		message = 'Pre-Enabled';
		this._logResults('Change Default Credentials', message);
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
		message = 'Not Changed';
		this._logResults('Change Default Credentials', message);
	}

	//5.2 Remove Default Credentials
	a = new GlideRecord('sys_home');
	a.addQuery('short_description', 'How To Login');
	a.addQuery('active', '1');
	a.addQuery('text', 'CONTAINS', 'The System Administrator');
	a.addQuery('text', 'CONTAINS', 'Password:');
	a.query();
	if (!a.hasNext()) {
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		while (a.next()) {
			a.setValue('active', 'false');
			a.update();
		}
		message = "Enabled";
	}
	this._logResults('Remove Default Credentials From Welcome Page', message);

	//3.1 Contextual Security
	this._checkPlugin('com.glide.role_management', 'active');

	// 3.2 Default Deny property
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.sm.default_mode', 'deny');

	// 3.4 Security Jump Start - ACL Rules
	this._checkPlugin('com.snc.system_security', 'active');

	// 8.1 High Security Plugin
	this._checkPlugin('com.glide.high_security', 'active');

	//2.1 Escape XML
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_text', 'true');

	// 2.2 High Security: Escape Jelly
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_all_script', 'true');

	//7.1 Rotate HTTP Session Identifiers
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.rotate_sessions', 'true');

	//7.2 Secure Session Cookies
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.secure_cookies', 'true');

	//3.5 Double Check Inbound transactions
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.strict.updates', 'true');

	//3.6 Check UI Action Conditions Before Execution
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.strict.actions', 'true');

	//7.5 Anti-CSRF Token
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.security.use_csrf_token', 'true');

	//2.3 Escape HTML
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.escape_html_list_field', 'true');

	//2.4 Escape Javascript
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.html.escape_script', 'true');

	//2.5 Client Generated Scripts Sandbox
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.use.sandbox', 'true');

	//2.10 SOAP Request Strict Security
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.soap.strict_security', 'true');

	//2.11 Jelly/JS Interpolation
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.jelly.js_interpolation.protect', 'true');

	//4.8 Script Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.scriptedprocessor', 'true');

	//4.11 Unload Request Authorization
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.basicauth.required.unl', 'true');

	//10.1 Enforce Relative Links
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.cms.catalog_uri_relative', 'true');

	//10.2 X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.set_x_frame_options', 'true');


	//6.2 Enable File Download Restrictions
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.strict_customer_uploaded_static_content', 'true');

	//6.6 Restrict Unauthenticated Access to Attachments
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.image_provider.security_enabled', 'true');

	//6.1 Force Download Attachment
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.attachment.force_download_all_mime_types', 'true');

	//2.6 Allow Embedded HTML Code
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.security.allow_codetag', 'false');

	//2.7 Allow Javascript tags in Embedded HTML
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.ui.security.codetag.allow_script', 'false');

	//2.8 Enable AJAXEvaluate
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.allow.ajaxevaluate', 'false');

	//10.6 Packages call removal tool
	var status = '';
		var pcrt0 = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_package');
		pcrt0.query();
		if(!pcrt0.hasNext()) {
			message = 'Not Required';

		} else {
			var pcrt1 = new GlideRecord('v_plugin');
				pcrt1.addQuery('name', 'Packages Call Removal Tool');
				pcrt1.addQuery('active', 'active');
				pcrt1.query();
			if (!pcrt1.hasNext()) {
						message = 'Not Enabled';
			} else {
				message = 'Pre-Enabled';
			}
		}
	this._logResults('Packages Call Removal Tool', message);


	// 10.7 system whitelist packages
	var d = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_package');
	d.query();
	if(!d.hasNext()) {
		result = 'Pass';
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
		message = "Not Enabled";
	}
	this._logResults('Whitelist Package Calls', message);

	// 10.8 system whitelist member
	var cwmc1 = new GlideRecord('sys_whitelist_member');
	cwmc1.query();
	if(!cwmc1.hasNext()) {
		result = 'Pass';
		message = "Pre-Enabled";
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
		message = "Not Enabled";
	}
	this._logResults('Whitelist Member Calls', message);

	//7.4 Cookie - HTTP Only
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.cookies.http_only', 'true');

	// 2.9 HTML Sanitizer
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.html.sanitize_all_fields', 'true');

	//3.9 Enabling AJAXGlideRecord ACL Checking
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.script.secure.ajaxgliderecord', 'true');

	//10.3 URL white list
	var h = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
	h.addEncodedQuery('name=glide.security.url.whitelist^valueISNOTEMPTY');
	h.query();
	if (h.next()) {
		result = 'Pass';
		message = 'Pre-Enabled';
	} else {
		result = 'Fail';
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		gr.initialize();
		gr.name = "glide.security.url.whitelist";
		gr.type = "string";
		gr.value = "http://www.servicenow.com";
		gr.insert();
		h = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
		h.addEncodedQuery('name=glide.security.url.whitelist^valueISNOTEMPTY');
		h.query();
		if (h.next()) {
			message = "Enabled with a recommended value: http://www.servicenow.com ";
		} else {
			message = "Fail to enable the property";
		}

	}
	this._logResults('glide.security.url.whitelist', message);


	//10.9 collection mode override
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.whitelist.manager.collection_mode.override', 'false');

	// 5.6 Disable Password-Less Authentication
	this._checkGlideProperty('glide.login.no_blank_password', 'true');
},

	//Output function

	_logResults : function(property, message) {
		var prop_msg = this.newItem("prop_msg");
		prop_msg.setAttribute("message", message);
		prop_msg.setAttribute("property", property);

	},

	// Generic function to execute property changes
	_checkGlideProperty: function(property, desired_value) {
		var message = "";
		if(gs.getProperty(property) == desired_value) {
			message = "Pre-Enabled";
		} else {
			gs.setProperty(property, desired_value); // confirm if it is enabled
			if(gs.getProperty(property) == desired_value){
				message = "Enabled";
			} else {
				message = "Fail to enable the property";
			}
		}
		this._logResults(property, message);
	},

	_checkPlugin: function(sys_prop, check) {
		var result = '';
		var latest = '';
		var message = '';
		var gpm;
		if (check == 'active'){
			if (GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
				result = 'Pass';
				message = 'Pre-Enabled';
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				gpm = new GlidePluginManager();
				gpm.registerPlugin(sys_prop);
				message = 'Enabled';

			}
			this._logResults(sys_prop, message);
		} else {
			if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive(sys_prop)){
				result = 'Pass';
				message = 'Pre-Enabled';
			} else {
				result = 'Fail';
				gpm = new GlidePluginManager();
				gpm.registerPlugin(sys_prop);
				message = 'Enabled';
			}
			this._logResults(sys_prop, message);
		}
	},

  type: 'EnableMandatory'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>romil.sheth_SHARE_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-30 18:54:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>e3f3cc7bdb852200305279e49f961952</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EnableMandatory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Security Best Practices" source="5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Security Best Practices">5f21ef17db3a1600305259e49f9619a9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e3f3cc7bdb852200305279e49f961952</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>romil.sheth</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-30 21:42:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

colr = rating.fontcolor("#FC8A3D"); } else { rating = 'F'; colr = rating.fontcolor("#F95050"); } // Mandatory Rating if (man_per == 100) { m_rating = 'A'; m_colr = m_rating.fontcolor("#71E279"); } else if (man_per >=89 && man_per <=99) { m_rating = 'B'; } else { m_rating = 'F'; m_colr = m_rating.fontcolor("#F95050"); } // Recommeded Rating if (rec_per >=95 && rec_per <=100) { r_rating = 'A'; r_colr = r_rating.fontcolor("#71E279"); } else if (rec_per >=85 && rec_per <=94) { r_rating = 'B'; } else { r_rating = 'F'; r_colr = r_rating.fontcolor("#F95050"); } // Optional Rating if (opt_per >=90 && opt_per <=100) { o_rating = 'A'; o_colr = o_rating.fontcolor("#71E279"); } else if (opt_per >=80 && opt_per <=89) { o_rating = 'B';
